Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DFSClient.DFSDataInputStream
    use HdfsDataInputStream instead.
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DistributedFileSystem.DiskStatus
    Use FsStatus instead
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol.FSConstants
    Please use HdfsConstants. This class is left only for other ecosystem projects which depended on it for SafemodeAction and DatanodeReport types.
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.FSImageFormat.Saver
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.RemoteBlockReader
    this is an old implementation that is being left around in case any issues spring up with the new RemoteBlockReader2 implementation. It will be removed in the next release.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DFSConfigKeys.DFS_DATANODE_USER_NAME_KEY
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DFSConfigKeys.DFS_NAMENODE_INTERNAL_SPNEGO_USER_NAME_KEY
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DFSConfigKeys.DFS_NAMENODE_USER_NAME_KEY
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DFSConfigKeys.DFS_SECONDARY_NAMENODE_INTERNAL_SPNEGO_USER_NAME_KEY
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DFSConfigKeys.DFS_SECONDARY_NAMENODE_USER_NAME_KEY
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.hadoop.fs.Hdfs.cancelDelegationToken(Token)
    Use Token.cancel instead.
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DFSClient.cancelDelegationToken(Token)
    Use Token.cancel instead.
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.DataNode.createSocketAddr(String)
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DFSClient.delete(String)
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.blockmanagement.DecommissionManager.Monitor.exceededNumNodesPerCheck()
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.qjournal.server.JournalNodeHttpServer.getAddress()
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.qjournal.server.JournalNode.getBoundHttpAddress()
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DistributedFileSystem.getDiskStatus()
    Use FileSystem.getStatus() instead
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DFSOutputStream.getNumCurrentReplicas()
    use HdfsDataOutputStream.getCurrentBlockReplication().
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DistributedFileSystem.getRawCapacity()
    Use FileSystem.getStatus() instead
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DistributedFileSystem.getRawUsed()
    Use FileSystem.getStatus() instead
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.fsdataset.FsDatasetSpi.getReplica(String, long)
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.fsdataset.impl.FsDatasetImpl.getReplica(String, long)
    use FsDatasetImpl.fetchReplicaInfo(String, long) instead.
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.protocol.StorageReceivedDeletedBlocks.getStorageID()
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DFSClient.mkdirs(String)
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DFSClient.open(String, int, boolean, FileSystem.Statistics)
    Use DFSClient.open(String, int, boolean) instead.
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DFSClient.rename(String, String)
    Use DFSClient.rename(String, String, Options.Rename...) instead.
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.NameNodeRpcServer.rename(String, String)
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.FSDirRenameOp.renameForEditLog(FSDirectory, String, String, long)
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.FSDirRenameOp.renameTo(FSDirectory, FSPermissionChecker, String, String, boolean)
    Use FSDirRenameOp.renameToInt(FSDirectory, String, String, boolean, Options.Rename...)
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.FSNamesystem.renameTo(String, String, boolean)
    Use FSNamesystem.renameTo(String, String, boolean, Options.Rename...) instead.
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.FSDirRenameOp.renameToInt(FSDirectory, String, String, boolean)
    org.apache.hadoop.fs.Hdfs.renewDelegationToken(Token)
    Use Token.renew instead.
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DFSClient.renewDelegationToken(Token)
    Use Token.renew instead.
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.DFSOutputStream.sync()
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.FSDirRenameOp.unprotectedRenameTo(FSDirectory, String, String, INodesInPath, INodesInPath, long)
    See FSDirRenameOp.renameToInt(FSDirectory, String, String, boolean, Options.Rename...)
